verses.verse: And Jacob <WH3290> called <WH7121> to his sons, <WH1121> and said, <WH559> Gather <WH622> yourselves together, that I may tell <WH5046> you that which <WH834> shall befall <WH7122> you in the last <WH319> days. <WH3117>
Gather <WH6908> yourselves together, and hear, <WH8085> you sons <WH1121> of Jacob; <WH3290> and listen <WH8085> to Israel <WH3478> your father. <WH1>

Reuben, <WH7205> you are my firstborn, <WH1060> my might, <WH3581> and the beginning <WH7225> of my strength, <WH202> the excellency <WH3499> of dignity, <WH7613> and the excellency <WH3499> of power: <WH5794>

Unstable <WH6349> as water, <WH4325> you shall not excel; <WH3498> because <WH3588> you went <WH5927> up to your father's <WH1> bed; <WH4904> then <WH227> defiled <WH2490> you it: he went <WH5927> up to my couch. <WH3326>
Simeon <WH8095> and Levi <WH3878> are brothers; <WH251> instruments <WH3627> of cruelty <WH2555> are in their habitations. <WH4380>

O my soul, <WH5315> come <WH935> not you into their secret; <WH5475> to their assembly, <WH6951> my honor, <WH3519> be not you united: <WH3161> for in their anger <WH639> they slew <WH2026> a man, <WH376> and in their self-will <WH7522> they dig <WH6131> down <WH6131> a wall. <WH7794>

Cursed <WH779> be their anger, <WH639> for it was fierce; <WH5794> and their wrath, <WH5678> for it was cruel: <WH7185> I will divide <WH2505> them in Jacob, <WH3290> and scatter <WH6327> them in Israel. <WH3478>

Judah, <WH3063> you are he whom your brothers <WH251> shall praise: <WH3034> your hand <WH3027> shall be in the neck <WH6203> of your enemies; <WH341> your father's <WH1> children <WH1121> shall bow <WH7812> down <WH7812> before you.

Judah <WH3063> is a lion's <WH738> whelp: <WH1482> from the prey, <WH2964> my son, <WH1121> you are gone <WH5927> up: he stooped <WH3766> down, he couched <WH7257> as a lion, <WH738> and as an old <WH3833> lion; <WH3833> who <WH4310> shall rouse <WH6965> him up?

The scepter <WH7626> shall not depart <WH5493> from Judah, <WH3063> nor a lawgiver <WH2710> from between <WH996> his feet, <WH7272> until <WH5704> <WH3588> Shiloh <WH7886> come; <WH935> and to him shall the gathering <WH3349> of the people <WH5971> be.

Binding <WH631> his foal <WH5895> to the vine, <WH1612> and his ass's <WH860> colt <WH1121> to the choice <WH8321> vine; <WH8321> he washed <WH3526> his garments <WH3830> in wine, <WH3196> and his clothes <WH5497> in the blood <WH1818> of grapes: <WH6025>
His eyes <WH5869> shall be red <WH2447> with wine, <WH3196> and his teeth <WH8127> white <WH3836> with milk. <WH2461>
Zebulun <WH2074> shall dwell <WH7931> at the haven <WH2348> of the sea; <WH3220> and he shall be for an haven <WH2348> of ships; <WH591> and his border <WH3411> shall be to Zidon. <WH6721>
Issachar <WH3485> is a strong <WH1634> ass <WH2543> couching <WH7257> down between <WH996> two burdens: <WH4942>

And he saw <WH7200> that rest <WH4496> was good, <WH2896> and the land <WH776> that it was pleasant; <WH5276> and bowed <WH5186> his shoulder <WH7926> to bear, <WH5445> and became <WH1961> a servant <WH5647> to tribute. <WH4522>
Dan <WH1835> shall judge <WH1777> his people, <WH5971> as one <WH259> of the tribes <WH7626> of Israel. <WH3478>

Dan <WH1835> shall be a serpent <WH5175> by the way, <WH1870> an adder <WH8207> in the path, <WH734> that bites <WH5391> the horse <WH5483> heels, <WH6119> so that his rider <WH7392> shall fall <WH5307> backward. <WH268>
I have waited <WH6960> for your salvation, <WH3444> O LORD. <WH3068>
Gad, <WH1410> a troop <WH1416> shall overcome <WH1464> him: but he shall overcome <WH1464> at the last. <WH6119>
Out of Asher <WH836> his bread <WH3899> shall be fat, <WH8082> and he shall yield <WH5414> royal <WH4428> dainties. <WH4574>
Naphtali <WH5321> is a hind <WH355> let loose: <WH7971> he gives <WH5414> goodly <WH8233> words. <WH561>
Joseph <WH3130> is a fruitful <WH6509> bough, <WH1121> even a fruitful <WH6509> bough <WH1121> by a well; <WH5869> whose branches <WH1121> run <WH6805> over <WH5921> the wall: <WH7791>
The archers <WH1167> <WH2671> have sorely <WH4843> grieved <WH4843> him, and shot <WH7232> at him, and hated <WH7852> him:

But his bow <WH7198> stayed <WH3427> in strength, <WH386> and the arms <WH2220> of his hands <WH3027> were made strong <WH6339> by the hands <WH3027> of the mighty <WH46> God of Jacob; <WH3290> (from there <WH8033> is the shepherd, <WH7462> the stone <WH68> of Israel: <WH3478>)

Even by the God <WH410> of your father, <WH1> who shall help <WH5826> you; and by the Almighty, <WH7706> who shall bless <WH1288> you with blessings <WH1293> of heaven <WH8064> above, <WH5921> blessings <WH1293> of the deep <WH8415> that lies <WH7257> under, <WH8478> blessings <WH1293> of the breasts, <WH7699> and of the womb: <WH7356>

The blessings <WH1293> of your father <WH1> have prevailed <WH1396> above <WH5921> the blessings <WH1293> of my progenitors <WH2029> to the utmost bound <WH8379> of the everlasting <WH5769> hills: <WH1389> they shall be on the head <WH7218> of Joseph, <WH3130> and on the crown <WH6936> of the head <WH6936> of him that was separate <WH5139> from his brothers. <WH251>
Benjamin <WH1144> shall shred <WH2963> as a wolf: <WH2061> in the morning <WH1242> he shall devour <WH398> the prey, <WH5706> and at night <WH6153> he shall divide <WH2505> the spoil. <WH7998>

All <WH3605> these <WH428> are the twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> tribes <WH7626> of Israel: <WH3478> and this <WH2063> is it that their father <WH1> spoke <WH1696> to them, and blessed <WH1288> them; every one <WH376> according <WH834> to his blessing <WH1293> he blessed <WH1288> them.

And he charged <WH6680> them, and said <WH559> to them, I am to be gathered <WH622> to my people: <WH5971> bury <WH6912> me with my fathers <WH1> in the cave <WH4631> that is in the field <WH7704> of Ephron <WH6085> the Hittite, <WH2850>

In the cave <WH4631> that is in the field <WH7704> of Machpelah, <WH4375> which <WH834> is before <WH5921> <WH6440> Mamre, <WH4471> in the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> which <WH834> Abraham <WH85> bought <WH7069> with the field <WH7704> of Ephron <WH6085> the Hittite <WH2850> for a possession <WH272> of a burial plot. <WH6913>

There <WH8033> they buried <WH6912> Abraham <WH85> and Sarah <WH8283> his wife; <WH802> there <WH8033> they buried <WH6912> Isaac <WH3327> and Rebekah <WH7259> his wife; <WH802> and there <WH8033> I buried <WH6912> Leah. <WH3812>
The purchase <WH4735> of the field <WH7704> and of the cave <WH4631> that is therein was from the children <WH1121> of Heth. <WH2845>

And when Jacob <WH3290> had made an end <WH3615> of commanding <WH6680> his sons, <WH1121> he gathered <WH622> up his feet <WH7272> into <WH413> the bed, <WH4296> and yielded <WH1478> up the ghost, <WH1478> and was gathered <WH622> to his people. <WH5971>
